casebody.data:
First Department,

July, 1976

(July 1, 1976) Taw International Leasing, Inc., et al., Appellants, v Overseas Private Investment Corporation et al., Respondents.

Order, Supreme Court, New York County, entered on April 26, 1976, unanimously affirmed for the reasons stated by Ascione, J., at Special Term. Respondents shall recover of appellants $40 costs and disbursements of this appeal. Concur— Stevens, P. J., Markewich, Murphy, Capozzoli and Nunez, JJ.
